mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID ,ORG_CD ,SEND_REQ_SEQ ,SCOPE_LIST ,RQUEST_TYPE ,FP_SEND_REQ_YN ,FP_SEND_REQ_DT ,FP_SEND_REQ_START_DAY ,FP_SEND_REQ_END_DAY ,FP_CYCL ,ACCESS_TOKEN ,ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRE_IN ,ACCESS_TOKEN_ISSUE_DT ,ACCESS_TOKEN_DUE_DT ,ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRE_YN ,ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRE_DT ,REPRESH_TOKEN ,REPRESH_TOKEN_EXPIRE_IN ,REPRESH_TOKEN_ISSUE_DT ,REPRESH_TOKEN_DUE_DT ,REPRESH_TOKEN_EXPIRE_YN ,REPRESH_TOKEN_EXPIRE_DT ,REG_USER_ID ,REG_DT ,CHG_USER_ID ,CHG_DT FROM MEMBER_TOKEN WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND ORG_CD = #{orgCd} AND SEND_REQ_SEQ = #{sendReqSeq}
